job_tasks.phrase: werk je aan de dataflows die gaan over het leesgedrag van onder andere artikelen en video's
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes working with data flows and processing user behavior data, which is a core data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Denk je na over de beste manier om de data te organiseren en vereenvoudigen om aan alle behoeften te voldoen.
job_tasks.justification: Organizing and simplifying data to meet needs falls under data engineering's responsibility for efficient data management and accessibility.

job_tasks.phrase: onderhoud je de data stack en werk je met Dbt, Airflow/Conveyor en Bitbucket.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining a data stack and using tools like DBT and Airflow are classic data engineering responsibilities for pipeline management.

job_tasks.phrase: zie je toe op de code en de bewerking ervan binnen het team.
job_tasks.justification: Overseeing code and its processing relates to ensuring the quality and integrity of data pipelines, a data engineering concern.

job_tasks.phrase: heb je een brugfunctie tussen de Data Area en het Data- & Innovatieteam voor alle technische zaken.
job_tasks.justification: Acting as a bridge for technical matters implies developing and managing technical integrations and solutions between teams, which aligns with software development principles.

job_tasks.phrase: heb je naast je specialistische werk als engineer ook oog voor de behoeften van redacties en andere relevante stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: Having an eye for the needs of editorial staff and other stakeholders indicates an understanding of business requirements and how technical solutions support them.

job_tasks.phrase: en denk je graag mee over verbeteringen en innovaties
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to improvements and innovations shows engagement with business goals and strategic thinking beyond just technical implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Binnen de context van Data Mesh heb je ook oog voor: Beveiliging van data (access control, data minimalisatie)
job_tasks.justification: Data security (access control, data minimization) within a Data Mesh context is a crucial aspect of data engineering for robust data product management.
Data ownership is a principle managed within data engineering to ensure clear accountability and governance of data products.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring van de kwaliteit van data
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring data quality is a fundamental data engineering task to ensure the reliability of data pipelines and products.

job_tasks.phrase: Vindbaarheid van data via de Data Mesh
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring data discoverability within a Data Mesh is a key data engineering objective for enabling data product consumption.
Data interoperability is an important consideration in data engineering to enable seamless data exchange and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: inzichten in data om hun doelen te bereiken
Je werkt ook nauw samen met de Data Area, een team met tracking specialisten en data engineers
heb je een brugfunctie tussen de Data Area en het Data- & Innovatieteam voor alle technische zaken
heb je naast je specialistische werk als engineer ook oog voor de behoeften van redacties en andere relevante stakeholders
en denk je graag mee over verbeteringen en innovaties

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering tasks, data pipeline management, and maintaining data stacks. While there's a mention of future development in Generative AI, the core responsibilities and current technologies described do not align with the specialized skills of a GenAI Engineer.
